website_summaries.verdict: This cream can help skin look and feel younger, but some skin types may have a negative reaction to it.
pros: Reduces the appearance of wrinkles and scars and is also a moisturizer
It can be used as a day or night cream
cons: This product can cause dry, flaky skin or irritated skin

customer_reviews.title: Too Thick and Smelled Too Strong
customer_reviews.text: This cream left a very thick residue on my face and the smell was too strong for me (I am pretty sensitive to smells, so likely other people don't have an issue with this).
